config.wandering_trader_express_delivery:
Bandit mob pool configuration, format: modid:entity_id,weight,glowing
Example:
 minecraft:pillager,40,true
 youmod:your_bandit,50,true
Whether to reload the mob pool configuration every time bandits are spawned

Items required to open the GUI, format: modid:item_id,amount
Example:
 minecraft:emerald,1 (default - 1 emerald)
 minecraft:diamond,2 (requires 2 diamonds)
 minecraft:gold_ingot,5 (requires 5 gold ingots)
Note: Player can hold any configured item in main or off hand
Enable detailed debug logs for development and troubleshooting
Enable info logs for general operations
Enable info logs for general operations
Enable warn logs for potential issues
Enable error logs for critical issues
